summary: Portfolio Controls surface raw HTTP errors
why_it_hurts: Advisors receive opaque status messages (e.g., 403) and escalate false incidents.

summary: Price fetch failures silently zero holdings
why_it_hurts: Charts collapse to $0 with no alert, leading to incorrect client briefings.

summary: README references importer that UI lacks
why_it_hurts: Advisors cannot bulk-load historical data despite documentation, forcing manual entry.
Core cash events cannot be recorded because validation blocks zero-price entries.
Repeated 404s delay pricing and clutter logs; holdings show zeros.

summary: ROI fallback runs silently after API errors
why_it_hurts: Investors trust stale ROI because the UI never indicates a degraded mode.
Switching devices resets privacy/compact options, confusing users.
Compliance must copy/paste security events, risking omissions in regulatory filings.
Ops miss fresh lockouts unless they manually refresh, violating the runbook.

summary: Stale price flag never reaches UI
why_it_hurts: Stale benchmarks go unnoticed until endpoints throw 503, extending outages.
Quant team loses data needed for analytics; manual API calls add toil.
